snippet: It is heartening that a former executive with Massey Energy was sentenced to three-and-a-half years in prison.
abstract: Editorial welcomes sentencing of David Hughart, former executive with Massey Energy, to three-and-a-half years in prison, in connection with the deadly explosion at the Upper Big Branch Mine in 2010 in West Virginia; praises R Booth Goodwin II, United States attorney on the case, for adopting the right course in using conspiracy law to move up the chain of culpability.
lead_paragraph: It is heartening that a former executive with Massey Energy was sentenced to three-and-a-half years in prison.

headline.main: Mismanagement and Death in a Coal Mine
